text.more: This network was made using Plutarch's Roman Lives. Each interaction between two individuals or a group was noted. This graph was made using the ForceAtlas2 in Gephi. Size is determined by the number of connections an individual has. This network demonstrates Plutarch's focus on foreign wars and eastern leaders like Mithridates and Cleopatra. It also reveals his interest in Octavian.
text.intro: A social network made from Plutarch's Roman Lives after the death of Sulla. Includes Lucullus, Pompey, Crassus, Cicero, Cato the Younger, Brutus, Antony, and Caesar
text.title: Networking Plutarch's Roman Lives After Sulla
